articles.title: DoubleVerify expands brand suitability tools across Meta Reels and Feeds
articles.author: Mediaweek
articles.summary: DoubleVerify has extended its AI-powered brand suitability measurement to cover 30 unique content-level categories across Facebook and Instagram Feeds and Reels. This expansion builds on DV's earlier rollout and offers deeper post-bid measurement capabilities for campaign performance and content adjacency, with unified controls and real-time insights for advertisers.

articles.title: Clean up your TV setup with the Dreamscreens TV Skirt Flex, now just $24
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: Dreamscreens introduced the TV Skirt Flex, a product designed to hide clutter behind TVs. The Dreamscreens TV Skirt Flex is available for $23.99 (originally $29.99).

articles.title: 29 Things People Who Live In Hot Climates Swear By So You Can Stay Cool Or Melt Trying
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The article introduces several products designed to help consumers stay cool during hot weather. One notable product is the Shark Flex Breeze portable fan, a cordless fan featuring a misting function and long battery life. Additionally, the article highlights the Nuwave Brio 8-quart air fryer as a way to cook without heating up the kitchen.

articles.title: Understanding Teen Skin Challenges with Carmel Soap Company
articles.author: News4SA
articles.summary: Carmel Soap Company is introducing gentle skincare solutions designed for young, sensitive skin. The company is launching limited-edition Peach and Lemon Hand Creams for the back-to-school season, which are designed to keep hands soft and clean.

articles.title: Nintendo Direct Partner Showcase live: all the announcements and news as it happened
articles.author: Rob Dwiar
articles.summary: Hollow Knight: Silksong is scheduled to launch sometime in 2025, potentially around the same time as the ROG Xbox Ally handhelds launch during Gamescom 2025. The Duskbloods from FromSoftware is set to launch in 2026 exclusively for Nintendo Switch 2.

articles.title: I tested DJI's long-awaited Osmo 360, and it's a surprisingly polished 360 camera with a tempting price tag
articles.author: Sam Kieldsen
articles.summary: DJI launched the Osmo 360 camera, a 360-degree camera with features like a crisp 2-inch touchscreen, intuitive three-button layout, and removable battery. The Osmo 360 is cheaper than Insta360's equivalent bundles, starting at £409.99 / AU$759 and has 128GB of built-in storage.

articles.title: 43 Products With Impressive Before And After Pics
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Several new products have been introduced, including a Brazilian Bum Bum body cream by Sol de Janeiro featuring guarana extract and coconut oil, and a Stomp 'N Go pads designed for pet urine stain removal. Additionally, Bissell has launched the Little Green Machine, a portable cleaning gadget, and there are several enamel paint introduced that can refresh the surfaces of metal appliances.

articles.title: Dyson Promo Codes & Coupons For August 2025
articles.author: Blake Esken
articles.summary: Dyson offers promotions and deals on vacuums like the V8 Absolute, Ball Animal 3 Complete, and Dyson Gen5detect cordless vacuum. The company also provides discounts on haircare products, such as the Airwrap and Supersonic hair dryers, and has a Dyson Renewed section for refurbished items.

articles.title: The Best Twin Mattresses On Amazon That Ship Right To Your Front Door
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Lucid and Nectar Classic twin mattresses are available on Amazon. These mattresses are highly rated and supported by numerous positive reviews, indicating customer satisfaction with the product.

articles.title: I tried Dyson's new Airwrap Co-anda 2x to see if it lived up to the hype - here's my honest opinion
articles.author: ELISE WILSON
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Airwrap Co-anda 2x multi-styler and dryer, an improved model of its popular hair styling tool. Powered by the new Hyperdymium 2 motor, the Airwrap Co-anda 2x delivers twice the air pressure for better curling, faster drying, and straighter styles without heat damage. It features new attachments like the AirSmooth2x finishing attachment and includes new technology like the i.d. curl feature.

articles.title: After Using Pixel Phones for 5 Years, I Know They're Worth the Money
articles.author: Yadullah Abidi
articles.summary: Google's Pixel phones offer a unique Android experience with exclusive features and long-term software support. The Pixel series features camera improvements, including features like Night Sight and Magic Eraser and are powered by Google's Tensor chips. Google offers up to seven years of software support for Pixel 8 and newer devices and five years for older models like Pixel 6 and Pixel 7.

articles.title: Meet Lume: Stanford researcher invents robotic lamp that can fold your laundry
articles.summary: Aaron Tan, a robotics researcher, is introducing Lume, a robotic lamp designed for folding laundry. The Lume is currently a physical prototype and is expected to ship next year for under $2,000. Pre-orders are available with a $49 refundable deposit.

articles.title: Understanding Teen Skin Challenges with Carmel Soap Company
articles.summary: Carmel Soap Company is introducing new gentle skincare solutions designed for young, sensitive skin, featuring a three-step routine. Additionally, they are launching limited-edition Peach and Lemon Hand Creams just in time for the back-to-school season, offering a fragrant way to keep hands soft and clean.

articles.title: The Best Twin Mattresses On Amazon That Ship Right To Your Front Door
articles.author: McKenzie Dillon
articles.summary: Amazon offers a variety of twin mattresses from brands like Lucid, Leesa, Nectar, Casper, and Vibe, catering to different sleeping positions, body types, and preferences. The Lucid 10-inch Gel Memory Foam mattress is highlighted as a great overall option, while the Leesa Sapira Hybrid Mattress offers upgraded features like edge support and cooling cover and the Nectar Classic mattress has a high-end memory foam feel. The Casper Element is an Amazon exclusive mattress, and the Vibe Gel Memory Foam Mattress has a cushy medium-soft profile.

articles.title: Coors Light Releases Deodorant You Can Refrigerate
articles.author: Brahmjot Kaur
articles.summary: Coors Light expanded into the personal care space. The company launched a new Dura Chill deodorant in collaboration with Duradry.

articles.title: NordVPN Is Giving Android Users a Spam Call Killer
articles.summary: NordVPN launched a Spam Call Protection feature for its Android app, currently available only in the US. This feature analyzes call metadata to warn users about potential scam calls, and it functions regardless of whether the VPN is actively enabled.

articles.title: For Sale: New Ink HP Printer Cartridges
articles.author: Larry Storo
articles.summary: HP offers new Ink Printer Cartridges for sale at $50 each.

articles.title: Starbucks to shut down all ‘Pick Up' stores: See list of NY locations
articles.author: Lohud
articles.summary: Starbucks has launched its 'Green Apron Service' nationwide to enhance speed, personalization, and hospitality across its stores. This initiative complements their existing pickup-only model, initially introduced in New York, which caters to mobile orders for quick and convenient pickup.

articles.title: NordVPN Is Giving Android Users a Spam Call Killer
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: NordVPN has launched a new feature called "Scam Call Protection" designed to alert users to potential telemarketers or scammers. This feature, currently available only for Android users in the US, analyzes call metadata to identify and warn users about potential spam calls. The NordVPN app must be installed on the phone for the protection to work, regardless of VPN status.

articles.title: 35 Beauty Products So Good At Their Jobs That Even Beauty Cynics Will Be Impressed
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies have launched or introduced new beauty and personal care products. L'Oreal Paris released the Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray Mist, while Monday Haircare introduced a Dry Shampoo with added keratin. Additionally, Black Girl Sunscreen launched Make It Pop Sungloss with SPF 50.

articles.title: RECAP: Carson Beck EXCEEDS Expectations In First Miami Hurricanes Practice
articles.summary: The WeAreIowa app enables users to stream WeAreIowa content on their phones.

articles.title: Find your niche, fill it with real product
articles.author: Times Team
articles.summary: Lisa King launched 'AF Drinks,' alcohol-free cocktails, capitalizing on the trend toward healthier living. To promote the product launch, the company focused on strong branding and sampling, alongside a US campaign featuring Khloé Kardashian and Kris Jenner, to attract health-conscious consumers.

articles.title: Bank of America Securities Reiterated a Buy Rating on Oddity Tech (ODD)
articles.author: Talha Qureshi
articles.summary: Oddity Tech Ltd. plans to launch new brands and expand internationally. The company operates a tech platform in the beauty and wellness sector, focusing on personalized products, with brands like Il Makiage and SpoiledChild showing strong momentum. Bank of America Securities has reiterated a Buy rating based on the company's strong market position and growth potential, driven by proprietary technology for product recommendations and a direct-to-consumer model.

articles.title: Walmart is selling a ‘sophisticated' $76 Burberry cologne for just $35, and shoppers like its ‘nice, subtle scent'
articles.author: Jon Winkler
articles.summary: Walmart is offering a discount on Burberry Touch for Men Cologne. This presents an opportunity for consumers to upgrade their fragrance at a lower price.

articles.title: What 1990s Internet History Tells Us About the AI Boom
articles.author: History at TIME here
articles.summary: In 2020, OpenAI introduced GPT-3 and later launched ChatGPT. In the 1990s, Microsoft launched Microsoft Explorer, AOL offered internet services and email, while Yahoo and Google debuted their search engines. Computer and TV manufactures also developed Web TV.

articles.title: Sony Reon Pocket Pro review: portable cooling for the heatwave
articles.author: Abha Shah
articles.summary: A tech brand is launching a wearable air-conditioning device designed for commuters and travelers. This device, worn on the back of the neck, utilizes a heat dissipation fan and dual thermo-modules to cool the upper body and can also heat up for winter use.

articles.title: The Guys' Guide to Garment Care: 6 Ways to Revolutionize Your Laundry Routine
articles.author: Michael Charboneau
articles.summary: Samsung introduces the , an innovative washer-dryer combo with a 5.3 cubic feet capacity. It features a Super Speed Cycle capable of washing and drying clothes in 68 minutes within one machine. The also includes AI Opti Wash & Dry for simplified garment care.

articles.title: This AI device lets you watch your dreams as lo-fi movies
articles.author: Singdhi Sokpo
articles.summary: Modem has launched the Dream Recorder, an AI-powered device that translates narrated dreams into short animated movies. The open-source device records dreams in low-resolution videos and saves them for a week, aiming to provide a tangible alternative to corporate-led AI.

articles.title: Canoe Daily Deal: Ninja blender shakes up a summer bargain
articles.author: Randi Mann
articles.summary: The Ninja Foodi Power Blender & Food Processor is on sale for $160, marked down from $230. Ninja products are generally middle-tier in terms of price and deliver quality results.

articles.title: Canoe Daily Deal: Ninja blender shakes up a summer bargain
articles.author: Randi Mann
articles.summary: Ninja products are noted for their power and functionality in making various concoctions, including frozen treats with their ice cream maker. The brand's blenders are effective at crushing ice and frozen fruits when sufficient liquid is added. Ninja products are positioned as a middle-tier option, offering quality results and durability.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7 Achieve 500,000 Fold Durability Tests
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, emphasizing enhanced durability through a reinforced Ultra Thin Glass (UTG) and improved hinge mechanism. These new models have undergone rigorous testing, exceeding 500,000 folds, and will be available globally starting August 14, 2025, with prices starting from IDR 28,499,000 for the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and IDR 17,999,000 for the Galaxy Z Flip 7 in Indonesia.

articles.title: Reclaim Your Weekend with This All-in-One Smart Laundry Machine
articles.author: John Bolster
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Bespoke AI Laundry Vented Combo™, an all-in-one washer and dryer featuring AI-powered Opti Wash and Dry™, remote scheduling via the SmartThings app, and a Flex Auto Dispense System. This machine streamlines laundry with a full wash-and-dry cycle as fast as 68 minutes, aiming to save time and effort for users.

articles.title: BJ's Wholesale Club opening store in Mechanicsburg
articles.author: Ed Gruver
articles.summary: BJ's Wholesale Club is opening a new location in Mechanicsburg, offering special membership deals. New services are available including gas savings, free delivery options, and curbside pickup. Members can also use ExpressPay through the BJ's mobile app.

articles.title: Morgan Stanley slaps eye-popping price target on Nvidia stock
articles.author: Moz Farooque
articles.summary: Morgan Stanley's analysis highlights Nvidia's (NVDA) potential related to AI demand, margin power, and supply-chain considerations. The analysis includes modeling of the AI demand.

articles.title: The 9 Best Men's Grooming Launches of July, From Ralph Lauren to Malin + Goetz
articles.author: Justin Fenner
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new grooming and skincare products. Proven Skinspecific Routines introduced skin-specific products tailored to fighting acne, hyperpigmentation, and signs of aging. Aveda launched Miraculous Hair Oil formulated with botanicals to smooth flyaways, while Ralph Lauren released Ralph's Club New York fragrance. Malin + Goetz launched Vitamin B5 Hydrating Bar. VT Cosmetics launched Reedle Shot 100 serum in US, and Medicube introduced Power Relief Spray.

articles.title: The best Ninja air fryers for all budgets, tried and tested
articles.summary: Ninja is launching several new air fryer models for 2025, including the Foodi Max Dual Zone Air Fryer AF400UK, the budget-friendly Air Fryer AF100UK, and the innovative Crispi 4-in-1 Portable Glass Air Fryer. These models offer a range of features such as dual-zone cooking, portability, and see-through design, catering to various kitchen needs and budgets.

articles.title: Viral Video of Robot Arms Folding Laundry Confirmed to Be CGI
articles.summary: Aaron Tan introduced Lume, a robotic lamp designed for laundry folding, blending into homes as a bedside floor lamp. Currently a 3D model, Lume is intended to be controlled via voice commands or an app, focusing solely on laundry folding. Pre-orders are available for $50, with a target price under $2,000 and shipping aimed for 2026, potentially offering laundry folding as a feature upgrade, similar to Tesla FSD.

articles.title: Is the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 worth the $1,100? Here's what I think after 2 weeks
articles.author: Henry T. Casey
articles.summary: Samsung has released the Galaxy Z Flip 7, a foldable phone with a 6.9-inch display that folds into a 4.1-inch form factor. The phone features a long battery life, supporting wired charging speeds of up to 25W, and includes a FlexWindow screen for media player interface and other functionalities. The Z Flip 7 is the first of Samsung's Flip phones compatible with DeX mode.

articles.title: edatanetworks Inc. Receives Approval for Online-to-Offline Digital Commerce Patent from USPTO
articles.author: Business Wire
org: United States Patent and Trademark Office
articles.summary: edatanetworks Inc. received a patent continuation from the USPTO for its Click2Sale technology. This patent strengthens edatanetworks' intellectual property and reinforces its capability to measure the impact of digital marketing on in-store sales. The Click2Sale technology links online consumer interactions with transaction data to deliver verifiable insights to merchants.

articles.title: First commercial food delivery robots launched in Saudi Arabia
articles.author: Lama Alhamawi
articles.summary: Jahez, in partnership with ROSHN Group, has launched an autonomous food delivery service in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. This service, licensed by the Kingdom's Transport General Authority, utilizes five autonomous robots equipped with sensors and cameras to deliver food orders from nearby restaurants, contributing to lower carbon emissions and reduced delivery times. The service is currently operating within ROSHN Front's Business Area with plans for expansion.

articles.title: Bradford, it's taco time! Mexi Bean Express lands at Darley Street Market
articles.author: Sally Butters
articles.summary: Mexi Bean Express, a halal Mexican food brand, opened a new restaurant at Darley Street Market in Bradford on July 12th. The restaurant offers burritos, tacos, and nachos, with delivery available across the region.

articles.title: Aldi is selling £14.99 tool that banishes creases & transforms your clothes in seconds – plus is half of Philips' price
articles.author: Hana Carter
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced several new products, including the Ambiano Handheld Garment Steamer, a cost-effective alternative to Philips' steamer, and the Ambiano High Speed Blending Set. The retailer has also launched the Crofton Everyways Pan, Lacura beauty products and a cordless multifunction tool, all positioned as affordable dupes of more expensive brands.

articles.title: Reimagined '80s Soda Brand Debuts New Flavor Inspired by Summer Staple
articles.author: Marisa Losciale
articles.summary: Slice Soda has launched a new flavor, Watermelon, for its prebiotic & probiotic soda line. This new flavor, described as a bold and tasty twist on a summer staple, contains prebiotics, probiotics, and postbiotics with only 35 calories per can. The new Slice Watermelon Soda is exclusively available in the refrigerated section of Albertsons' family of stores.

articles.title: How to tell if that song is AI-generated? Here are some things to check
articles.author: Associated Press
articles.summary: Deezer is implementing a system to identify and flag albums containing AI-generated songs. The Deezer app and website will notify listeners with an on-screen label indicating 'AI-generated content'. This system uses in-house technology to detect patterns in AI-generated audio.

articles.title: Glooscap First Nation in Nova Scotia to launch seafood market this year
articles.author: The Canadian Press
articles.summary: Glooscap First Nation's investment arm, Glooscap Ventures, is launching a seafood market featuring local products caught and processed by its members. Built in partnership with Lindsay Construction, the market will offer produce, deli meats, seafood, and baked goods, primarily sourced from Glooscap Seafood, and is expected to create 10 full-time and 20 part-time jobs.

articles.title: SEE: Aldi draws big opening day crowd in Port Orange
articles.author: Clayton Park
articles.summary: Aldi opened a new grocery store at 5500 S. Williamson Blvd. in Port Orange on July 31, 2025. The opening was celebrated with a ribbon-cutting ceremony, and the store offered a dozen grade A large eggs for $2.71.

articles.title: Ninja Swirl Lands in the UK: A Key Feature Revealed
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Swirl by Creami, a 13-in-1 frozen dessert maker, in the UK. The Ninja Swirl technology is designed to deliver smooth and consistent results, particularly when making frozen drinks and desserts. Select Ninja blender models now feature Swirl technology, including Ninja Foodi Power Nutri Duo Smoothie Bowl Maker and Nutrient Extractor [CB350UK], Ninja Professional Plus Kitchen System with Auto-iQ [BN801UK], and Ninja Foodi ZeroWaste Blender with auto-iQ [HB550UK].

articles.title: Tweet generator AI: Write less, tweet more
articles.author: Sarah Dunsby
articles.summary: AI tweet generator tools help users quickly create engaging tweets. These tools allow users to input a few words, set a tone, and choose hashtags to generate tweets that align with their brand voice and style. These tools save time and help in marketing and promotional activities.

articles.title: Mpumalanga Fresh Produce Market misses another deadline: Agriculture announces postponement of launch
articles.author: Bridget Mpande
org: Mpumalanga Department of Agriculture, Rural Development, Land and Environmental Affairs
articles.summary: The Mpumalanga Department of Agriculture, Rural Development, Land and Environmental Affairs (Dardlea) postponed the launch of the Mpumalanga International Fresh Produce Market (MIFPM) due to outstanding regulatory processes. A new launch date will be communicated after the by-laws are adopted and the Certificate of Occupancy is finalized. Dardlea will continue its outreach program.

articles.title: Dragons' Den is back – these are all the businesses pitching tonight
articles.author: Alex Lee
articles.summary: DabbaDrop introduces a zero-waste meal delivery service, offering pre-cooked vegetarian meals in reusable containers. Comfa launches sensory-friendly T-shirts with built-in fidget toys for both kids and adults. Azio Beauty presents a luxury skincare line sold directly to consumers, cutting out the middleman, and Prsnt offers a virtual gifting app with gifts from various brands.

articles.title: Starbucks closing up to 90 of these stores, including Florida locations
articles.author: News Journal
articles.summary: Starbucks launched its 'Green Apron Service' initiative nationwide. The initiative aims to improve speed, personalization, and hospitality across 11,000 stores.

articles.title: LUV Car Wash Expands Los Angeles Footprint With Acquisition of Big Ben Express Car Wash in Paramount
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: LUV Car Wash is expanding its presence in Greater Los Angeles through the acquisition of Big Ben Express in Paramount. This acquisition aims to provide more access to fast and eco-friendly car washes for Southern California.

articles.title: FS Launches Future-Ready 200G Switch Solution for AI Storage and Seamless 400G Migration
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: FS has launched the N8550-24CD8D, a 200G switch designed for AI storage and data center deployments. The switch features high throughput, flexible port design, and scalability to support evolving networking needs.

articles.title: Top-rated cordless vacuum to rival Dyson and Shark is less than £100
articles.author: newsdesk@devonlive.com
articles.summary: The Avalsor Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is now available on Amazon for £95.45, offering a 52% discount. Driven by a 550W brushless motor, it features 45,000Pa suction, a battery life of up to 65 minutes, an LED touchscreen, and anti-tangle technology. Alternative options include the Gtech Airram 2 and the Shark PowerPro Pet Cordless Stick Vacuum.

articles.title: XaaS To SaS: The Evolution Of The Service Model
articles.author: Kalyan Kumar
articles.summary: HCLSoftware's Kalyan Kumar introduces Service as Software (SaS), an evolution of XaaS that embeds AI agents for automation and outcome-driven delivery. SaS leverages AI agents to automate tasks, orchestrate workflows, and deliver tangible results, moving beyond software-enabled service models, enabling outcome-driven consumption, faster innovation, and silo-free operations.

articles.title: Nvidia will support GeForce drivers on Windows 10 until October 2026
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Nvidia is releasing a new GeForce Game Ready Driver that expands support for Windows 10 devices and G-Sync displays. The update improves performance in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 and Mafia: The Old Country.

articles.title: Unilever beats sales forecasts as ice cream business shines
articles.author: Yadarisa Shabong
articles.summary: Unilever's ice cream business experienced strong growth due to innovation, including the launch of the Magnum Utopia range. This division is slated to be spun off into The Magnum Ice Cream Company later in the year. Unilever will retain a minority stake in the ice cream business.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 available with big discount for limited period: 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skip
articles.summary: OnePlus announced its Independence Day Sale, offering discounts on devices including the recently launched OnePlus Nord 5, Nord CE5, OnePlus 13 series, OnePlus Pad Go, and OnePlus Buds 4. The Nord 5, launched at a starting price of Rs 31,999, is available with an instant bank discount of Rs 2,250 and No-Cost EMI options.

articles.title: How AI Agents Are Helping Financial Institutions Become Truly Customer-Centric
articles.author: Zehra Cataltepe
articles.summary: TAZI.AI utilizes AI agents to analyze customer transactions and feedback, enabling financial institutions (FIs) to provide hyper-personalized product offers based on customer's current needs. This approach helps FIs move from a product-centric approach to a customer-centric one, providing relevant products and building long-term relationships.

articles.title: Nintendo Direct Partner Showcase – live: Every game announcement as it happens
articles.author: Alex Lee
articles.summary: Nintendo is holding a Nintendo Direct Partner Showcase to announce new third-party games for both the Switch 2 and the original Nintendo Switch. The 25-minute presentation will focus entirely on these third-party games, likely including ports and new releases. The showcase can be streamed on Nintendo's YouTube channel.

articles.title: Foldable Truths in 2025: What South Africans Really Want from Their Next Smartphone
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: HONOR launched the Magic V5 foldable smartphone, designed to address real-world challenges for South African users. The Magic V5 boasts a thin design, reinforced titanium hinge, a large battery, dual SIM support, and a glare-resistant AMOLED display. It also features Magic Portal 2.0 and offers compatibility with the Google suite.

articles.title: Is That Song by AI or a Human? Here Are Some Things to Check
articles.author: Kelvin Chan
articles.summary: Deezer is flagging albums containing AI-generated songs to combat streaming fraud and provide transparency to listeners. The Deezer app and website now notify listeners with an on-screen label indicating tracks created with song generators. This system uses in-house technology to detect patterns in AI-generated audio, with up to 18% of songs uploaded daily being flagged as AI-generated.

articles.title: Aspire Biopharma Holdings, Inc. Unveils E-commerce Platform, Launches with its BUZZ BOMB Pre-Workout Supplement
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Aspire Biopharma Holdings, Inc. has launched a new e-commerce platform, buzzbomb.buzz, featuring BUZZ BOMB™, a sublingual pre-workout supplement. The platform offers direct-to-consumer sales, exclusive promotions, and customer support, with introductory offers including special pricing and free shipping for registered customers. The site features sample packs and 30-packs in various configurations.

articles.title: Harry Styles is flogging sex toys online while his fans wait patiently for new music
articles.author: Onwaba Siwani
articles.summary: Harry Styles' brand, Pleasing, recently launched new products, specifically a pink and burgundy double-sided vibrator and a silicone-based lubricant. The launch event was teased through a cryptic Instagram reel, and both products sold out within hours. Pleasing plans to expand distribution to other countries.

articles.title: Nintendo is ready to show off its partners.
articles.author: Andrew Webster
articles.summary: Nintendo will air a Direct showcase at 9AM ET, focusing on titles from third-party developers. This showcase potentially introduces or highlights new games from these developers.

articles.title: Best Queen Size Mattress 2025 - Top Rated Picks for Comfort & Support
articles.author: Zimble Digital
articles.summary: The Nectar Classic mattress is highlighted as the best overall queen-size mattress due to its balance of comfort and support, featuring gel-infused memory foam. DreamCloud Hybrid is recognized as ideal for back pain relief, combining memory foam and supportive coils. Saatva Classic is presented as the best luxury innerspring option with a dual-coil construction and organic cotton cover. Helix Midnight is designed for side sleepers and WinkBed offers plush comfort with strong edge support.

articles.title: Teads Unveils Connected Ads: A New Premium Brand and Performance Solution for the Open Internet
articles.author: Teads Holding Co.
articles.summary: Teads has launched the beta version of Connected Ads, a new branding solution. Connected Ads is a unified ad experience with two ad placements on a publisher page, designed to increase brand awareness and drive measurable outcomes through high-impact messaging and interactive elements.

articles.title: Why Tinder's ice cream collab gets the heartbreak struggle right
articles.author: Barry Rodgers
articles.summary: Tinder has collaborated with Indu Ice Cream to launch four limited-edition heartbreak-inspired ice cream flavors: Dil Ka Falooda, Not Your Match Ya, Your Ex's Tears, and Toxic Expresso. These flavors are available exclusively in Mumbai through Swiggy and Zomato as part of Tinder's Move On campaign.

articles.title: Vivo T4R With MediaTek Dimensity Chipset And 5,700mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specs
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Vivo launched the Vivo T4R, a new mid-range device in their T-series, aimed at catering to buyers across different brackets.

articles.title: One Tech Tip: Can you tell if that song AI-generated? Here are some things to check
articles.author: KELVIN CHAN
articles.summary: Deezer is introducing a new feature that flags albums containing AI-generated songs. This feature notifies listeners within the Deezer app and website with an on-screen label, 'AI-generated content', when some tracks on an album were created using AI song generators. The company utilizes in-house technology to detect patterns in AI-generated audio.

articles.title: Artisan bath products for the whole family
articles.author: Bio Box
articles.summary: Kelly Judd created Judd's Suds, a company that carries a line of artisan bath products. The product line includes bath bombs, beard products, non-nano zinc oxide sunscreen, deodorant, body butter, and hand-crafted soaps made from wholesome ingredients and essential oils.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy Book 4 Edge in India: Price, specifications, availability
articles.author: Ayushmann Chawla
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Book 4 Edge in India, featuring on-device AI, Microsoft Copilot+ integration, and Galaxy AI functionalities. The device, powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon X processor, includes features like Link to Windows and Chat Assist and is available starting at ₹64,990 through Samsung's website, Flipkart, and retail stores.

articles.title: Coral Cyprus (Shell Licensee) launches the new Shell GO+ campaign starring Shell stations, Michalis Sofokleous and Herodotos Miltiadous
articles.author: Promotional Activity
articles.summary: Coral Cyprus, a Shell licensee, is launching a new digital campaign for its updated Shell GO+ rewards app. The app allows users to earn points with purchases, redeem them for gifts, access exclusive contests, and win prizes. New users receive 200 welcome points, and exclusive offers on products and services will be available through the app.

articles.title: Reviewers Say These Cleaning Products Have 'Magical' Results
articles.author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
articles.summary: The article features a selection of cleaning products, including The Pink Stuff cleaning paste, stain removers for fabrics, Swedish dishcloths, Wet & Forget shower cleaner, Bar Keeper's Friend, Bissell CrossWave Pet Pro, microfiber cleaning cloths, Clorox toilet bowl cleaning gel, broom and dustpan sets, The Ringer cast iron cleaner, Dr. Bronner's Sal Suds, Scrub Daddy sponges, Wine Away, steel wool pads, and Mr. Clean Magic Eraser. Each product is described with its uses and accompanied by user testimonials.

articles.title: Uber Eats is adding AI to menus, food photos, and reviews
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Uber Eats is launching new features that utilize generative AI to improve menu descriptions, enhance food photos, and summarize customer reviews. They are also introducing a Live Order Chat feature for direct communication between businesses and customers and a system to reward users who upload photos of their orders. The aim is to enhance the customer experience and provide better information about food orders.

articles.title: York-based agency rises to the top of Google rankings in just 8 months
articles.author: Kev Gall
articles.summary: Nomada Digital has launched a new performance-backed guarantee for SEO clients. The guarantee ensures that if clients don't achieve their desired rankings within the first three months, they don't have to pay. The company's Founder, Danny Sullivan, expressed confidence in their service delivery and the value it brings to clients.

articles.title: Unique gifts with Lidl Plus!
articles.author: Promotional Activity
articles.summary: Lidl Cyprus is offering 10 unique summer gifts through its Lidl Plus loyalty program, including Grillmeister Gas Grills, Crivit Inflatable SUP Boards, Silvercrest Food Processors, Silvercrest Bladeless Fans, and PARKSIDE 20V Cordless Drills. Users with an active Lidl Plus account can participate in the competition from August 1st to August 31st by filling out the entry form on lidl.com.cy for a chance to win these prizes.

articles.title: 亚麻有 135 找OHui店 miracle moisture 777 - MayX发表于 我爱我家 - 论坛
articles.summary: Users discuss a Korean brand being a suitable alternative to Shiseido for sensitive skin. The brand also has a face wash which is recommended for users.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Book 4 Edge Laptop With Copilot+ Launched in India
articles.author: Shubham Verma
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Book 4 Edge, a new AI-powered Windows laptop integrated with Microsoft Copilot+. The Galaxy Book 4 Edge features a 15-inch anti-glare display, Copilot+ capabilities, Samsung's Galaxy AI ecosystem and is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon X processor.

articles.title: Tesco's 'cosy and cute' £39.50 jacket 'looks so good on'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Tesco's F&F Clothing range has launched a new borg jacket priced at £39.50. The F&F Borg Funnel Neck Zip Through Jacket in Neutral features a funnel neckline, two front pockets, storm cuffs and is made with 50% recycled polyester.

articles.title: Honda Launches All-New Prelude Teaser Page Ahead of Scheduled September 2025 Market Introduction
articles.author: JCN Newswire
articles.summary: Honda launched a teaser page on its website for the all-new Prelude, a specialty sports model. The Prelude is scheduled to go on sale in September 2025.

articles.title: Dyson's bestselling Airwrap named the ‘best product ever' is £100 off for a limited time
articles.author: Grace Salmon
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a limited-time £100 discount on its Airwrap multi-styler, now priced at £379.99. The new Dyson Airwrap i.d. features Bluetooth connectivity and integrates with the My Dyson App for personalized styling based on user hair type, including adjustments to timing, styling, and cool shot settings.

articles.title: 2027 Hyundai Tucson Spied Testing In Europe, Here's What We Know
articles.author: Samreen Pall
articles.summary: Hyundai is preparing to introduce its latest Pleos infotainment system with the Gleo AI assistant in the next-generation Hyundai Tucson SUV. The 2027 Tucson is expected to be a plug-in hybrid with an EV range of up to 100 km and will include advanced driver assistance systems (ADAS), including Level 2+ hands-free driving tech.

articles.title: These 23 Underrated Products Are So Freakishly Good, You'll Wonder What Other Hidden Gems You're Missing Out On
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Laneige is introducing its Neo Blurring Powder to matte-ify skin while maintaining a natural glow, packaged in a travel-friendly case. Neutrogena launched the Collagen Bank Daily Facial Moisturizer with SPF 30 for hydration and UV protection in one step. Elizabeth Mott released Thank Me Later Clean Face Towels, reusable, double-sided makeup removing wipes made from bio-based viscose staple fiber.

articles.title: New Look's red gingham summer dress is now just £22 in the sale
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: New Look is offering its Red Gingham V-Neck Midi Dress for £22 as part of a summer sale, reduced from £36.99. The dress features a red gingham print, puff sleeves, an open back with bow detail, and a flattering V-neckline and is suitable for summer holidays and casual occasions.

articles.title: Innovation in every pixel: Neo QLED 4K brings cinema to your home
articles.author: Gazeta Express
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Neo QLED 4K TV featuring Real Quantum Dot technology, an ultra-slim design, and smart home integration via SmartThings. The TV includes four HDMI 2.1 ports, eARC, and a 4K Quantum Neural Processor for optimized content and is available with free shipping and installation for 98' models from the Neo QLED, QLED or Crystal UHD lines.

articles.title: LG art exhibition marks three decades of development in Vietnam
articles.author: Bich Thuy
articles.summary: LG Electronics is celebrating 30 years in Vietnam, expanding its presence with manufacturing plants and R&D centers while committing to delivering 'smart life solutions' empowered by 'LG Affectionate Intelligence'.  LG launched the 'Art-ffection by LG' exhibition to thank Vietnamese users. Also, LG Uplus launched KidsTopia, LG Energy Solution launched a Battery Recycling Venture, and LG Display is set to unveil cutting-edge auto tech at SID Display Week 2025.

articles.title: MTR* and Airport Express Advertising Presents "5G Summer Thrill"
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: JCDecaux Transport and MTR launched "5G Summer Thrill," an outdoor advertising promotion featuring interactive live-streaming events at MTR stations, utilizing upgraded 5G technology to enhance engagement between advertisers and passengers. The promotion offers advertisers a platform for real-time interaction and timely information delivery to target audiences. It enables passengers to enjoy seamless, high-speed real-time interactive live streaming.

articles.title: UK's Next sales boosted by warm weather and M&S cyber disruption
articles.author: James Davey
articles.summary: Next acquired the brand rights to maternity retailer Seraphine. This acquisition expands Next's brand portfolio and introduces a new product/service line related to maternity wear.

articles.title: Samsung Z Fold 7 smartphone review: A leap forward
articles.author: The Irish Times
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a new folding phone that builds upon previous models. The company has enhanced various aspects, positioning it as a significant upgrade in its folding phone line.

articles.title: Haier launches F9 series washing machines with AI colour panel, one touch technology
articles.author: Ayushmann Chawla
articles.summary: Haier Appliances India has launched its new F9 Series Front Load Washing Machines, featuring an AI Colour Panel and One Touch operation. The F9 Series comes with features such as AI One Touch Technology, Direct Motion Motor with a 20-year warranty, and a 12 kg capacity, priced at ₹ 59,990, and includes a 5-year comprehensive product warranty. The washing machines are available through leading retail outlets and online platforms.

articles.title: AI Toys Emerge as the Next Consumer Tech Frontier, But Bubble Risks Loom-钛媒体官方网站
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing AI-powered toys to address the growing demand for emotional companionship. xAI launched an AI girlfriend service, OpenAI partnered with Mattel to infuse toys with conversational AI, and TOYCITY and Ropet are gaining traction in the AI toy market. These AI toys range from collectibles to interactive robots and virtual pets, aiming to provide emotional support and engagement, with China's AI toy market projected to reach 60 billion yuan in 2025.

articles.title: Top Strategies to Grow Your Car Wash Business and Boost Profits
articles.summary: Car wash businesses can improve profitability by investing in new equipment such as touchless car wash systems and water recycling. Diversifying service offerings with detailing and subscription models enhances customer experience and revenue streams. Embracing technology, such as automation and customer feedback systems, increases efficiency and satisfaction.

articles.title: Serchem appoints Dominic Arnold as Sales Executive for Scottish market
articles.author: Shropshire Live Business
articles.summary: Serchem, a manufacturer of hygiene and decontamination products, launched PDA51, a specialized product. The product launch honors Paul Arnold's legacy and aligns with Serchem's focus on technical innovation and quality.

articles.title: Korea's Top Lifestyle Brand ‘'Bouquet Garni'' Officially Debuts In Malaysia
articles.author: Adeline Leong
articles.summary: Bouquet Garni, a Korean lifestyle and body care brand, launched its flagship body wash collection in over 290 Guardian stores in Malaysia in late May 2025. The body wash line-up includes four scents: White Musk, Cherry Blossom, Ylang Ylang, and Baby Powder. Bouquet Garni has partnered exclusively with Guardian Malaysia for distribution.

articles.title: ‘The overall vibe was total chaos': Tesla Diner goes viral for long waits and mixed reviews
articles.author: Eve Upton-Clark
articles.summary: Tesla launched its retro-futuristic diner in Hollywood, featuring a menu designed by Eric Greenspan and served in Cybertruck-shaped boxes. The venue also includes a drive-in movie theater and a charging station. Tesla owners can order via the Tesla app for priority service.

articles.title: 35 Fun Products That Are Also Very Good At Their Jobs
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Nyx is introducing its new "Smushy" Matte Lip Balm, formulated with mochi rice powder, offering a soft matte look in flavors like cherry pie and raspberry sorbet. Built is launching "Puff Protein Bars," which are chocolate-covered marshmallows providing 17 grams of protein without any aftertaste. Vacation is releasing Classic Whip SPF 30, a lightweight and decadent sunscreen.

articles.title: Metro has up to 89% off for SG60, plus exclusive S$60 deals on Shiseido, HoneyWorld & WMF
articles.author: Kim Tan
articles.summary: Metro is celebrating Singapore's 60th birthday with SG60 deals, offering up to 89% off on various items until August 31, 2025. The sale includes discounted beauty products like Shiseido Sun Care Beauty Gem Box, Sulwhasoo, Elizabeth Arden, and Clinique Liquid Face Wash Duo Set, as well as health supplements like Nature's Nutrition Manuka Honey and Honey World UMF 12+ Raw Manuka Honey. Additionally, fashion items from K/WOODS and Goldlion, Sorella bras, Penthouse Living bedsets, WMF cookware, and Pierre Cardin luggage are also part of the promotion.

articles.title: A gallery of popular ice cream types around the world
articles.author: Michelle Peters
articles.summary: In 1969, Dario Fontanella, an ice cream shop owner in Mannheim, Germany, invented Spaghettieis. Inspired by Mont Blanc, Fontanella used a spätzle press to shape ice cream into spaghetti-like strands and covered it with strawberry sauce and white chocolate shavings.

articles.title: These 30 Products May Be Unexciting, Ordinary, Or Just Plain Mundane — But Somehow They're Still Life Changing
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff introduced their new 'Sqeezy' cleaning set, which features their cleaning paste and a versatile cleaning sponge. This product is designed to remove grease and mildew. Reviewers have praised 'The Pink Stuff' for its effectiveness.

articles.title: Samsung and LG Sweep 2025 Ergonomic Design Awards with Smart Home Innovations
articles.author: Korea Bizwire
articles.summary: Samsung's Bespoke AI Dishwasher won 'Best of the Best' for its design and features like the Auto Open Door. Samsung also received recognition for its Bespoke AI Hybrid Refrigerator and Bespoke AI Steam Robot Vacuum. LG Electronics won awards for its AI robot vacuum, LG MyCup tumbler washer featuring 360-degree rotating spray arms, and the LG Signature OLED T, the world's first wireless and transparent OLED TV.

articles.title: The Nespresso Vertuo Pop+ Just Reached Its Lowest Price Ever
articles.author: Naima Karp
articles.summary: The Nespresso Vertuo Pop+ is currently available at a 32% discount on Amazon, bringing the price down to $89. This machine is highlighted as a reliable option for single-serve coffee pods.

articles.title: 29 Products That Solve Summer Problems
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: Burt's Bees introduced an After Sun soother with aloe and coconut oil. Shark launched the Flex Breeze portable fan with misting features and 12-hour battery. Veer released the Cruiser City designed for carrying summer essentials and kids and Yonanas launched a soft-serve maker that transforms frozen fruit into sorbet.

articles.title: Hong Kong-developed EXOTICA UMAMI [EX M] challenges century old cooking traditions with breakthrough flavour enhancement technology
articles.author: Exotica Food Concepts
articles.summary: EXOTICA UMAMI ('EX M'), a multifunctional cooking sauce, was showcased at an event at the New World Millennium Hong Kong Hotel. Chefs demonstrated the sauce's ability to enhance flavors and tenderize proteins, with new dishes incorporating the sauce launching at AMA (grilled pork neck), Sagano (Exotica Umami EX M Teppanyaki beef), and Tao Li (EX M Poached Chicken) restaurants starting August 1. The sauce is available for purchase at the JW Marriott e-shop and Towngas Cooking Centre.

articles.title: An Overly Sexualized Ad for Jeans Stirs Up the Angry Mob
articles.summary: American Eagle launched a new ad campaign featuring Sydney Sweeney to promote its jeans. The campaign aims to appeal to a broader audience and move away from previous marketing strategies. The advertisements showcase Sweeney wearing and promoting American Eagle jeans.

articles.title: Samsung Bespoke AI Jet Ultra review: High tech home cleaning
articles.author: Tahnee-Jae Lopez-Vito
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Bespoke AI Jet Ultra, a cordless stick vacuum cleaner featuring long battery life, auto-empty function, multiple cleaner heads, and compatibility with the SmartThings app. This vacuum boasts AI-powered cleaning modes and a spray spinning sweeper for washing floors and retails for $1699 in Australia.

articles.title: Day Around the Bay: Another Death on the Russian River
articles.summary: A new cafe on Fourth Street is launching with a robot barista. The cafe will offer AI-generated art and music along with 'tech-forward coffee'.

articles.title: Yet Another SF Cafe Trying ‘Robot Baristas,' This Time at the Former Creamery Spot Near SoMa Caltrain
articles.summary: Coffee Wafflee is launching a new cafe featuring robot baristas, AI-generated art and music, and 'tech-forward coffee'. The cafe will also offer mini-waffles called 'wafflees' and self-serve ice cream waffle cones. The cafe plans to utilize a 'robot barista' from the startup Artly.

articles.title: Emirates Flight Catering lays foundation stone for Dhs160m laundry facility
articles.author: Gulf Today
articles.summary: Emirates Flight Catering has inaugurated a new laundry service.

articles.title: involve.me Launches First-Ever Conversational AI Agent for Funnel Creation
articles.summary: involve.me has launched the beta version of its AI Agent, a conversational AI designed for creating and optimizing sales and marketing funnels. The AI Agent enables users to generate, customize, and refine funnels by using simple English prompts. It allows users to create interactive landing pages and website embeds with quizzes, forms, surveys, and calculators by chatting with AI.

articles.title: Economic Watch: Thriving under pressure: Chinese companies build resilience, boost innovation amid headwinds
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: Sun Lijuan introduced AI-powered dolls with enhanced capabilities compared to traditional talking toys, including responding to almost anything and offering versions in multiple languages. Xibei catering chain is upgrading its children's meals with higher-quality options to attract family diners, including offering lightly salted meal sets for toddlers as young as one or two years old.

articles.title: Thriving under pressure: Chinese companies build resilience, boost innovation amid headwinds
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: Sun Lijuan is developing and testing new AI-powered dolls with improved capabilities and higher profit margins. I-KINGTEC developed a fully autonomous drone inspection system named "Orca", capable of unmanned data collection. Xibei is upgrading its children's meal options with higher-quality ingredients and improved safety measures to attract family diners.

articles.title: U&i launches affordable TWS, wireless soundbar and more in India, price starts at Rs 499
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: U&i launched new budget-friendly accessories including TWS earbuds, two wireless soundbars, and a fast multi-protocol charger. All products are priced under Rs 1,000 and have a minimum six-month warranty. These products aim to bring innovation and convenience to the urban consumer's lifestyle.

articles.title: Mess-Free Summers Start Here: Muddy Mat Launches New Line of Home and Pet Essentials for ...
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: Muddy Mat announced the arrival of its new product lineup. The lineup is designed to help pet lovers and homeowners tackle seasonal messes with ease.

articles.title: Best Games That Defined the Xbox Game Pass
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Xbox Game Pass has evolved from a perceived gimmick into a core service. It is now considered a central component of the Xbox ecosystem, suggesting significant development and adoption.

articles.title: India seeing good progress in EV space with entry of global players, says M&M
articles.author: Your Story
articles.summary: Tesla launched its Model Y, with prices starting at Rs 59.89 lakh. The company also opened its first experience center in Mumbai's BKC business district.

articles.title: Nintendo Direct July 2025: Switch 2 new adventures, new releases in August and later this ...
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Nintendo presented its July Partner Showcase, highlighting upcoming games for the Nintendo Switch. The showcase also provided a glimpse into titles potentially destined for the Nintendo Switch 2, Nintendo's next-generation console.

articles.title: srRAW 1.2 Is a Professional Cinema Camera Inside the iPhone
articles.author: Peta Pixel
articles.summary: Swiss Rig has launched srRAW 1.2, which is the next generation of its mobile digital product.

articles.title: Today is a Big Day for Elden Ring Nightreign Players Who Were Disappointed at Launch
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: FromSoftware and Bandai Namco are preparing to introduce a new 'Nightreign' mode to the Elden Ring game. The mode has been anticipated by fans since the game's launch, although it experienced a recent delay.
